title.en: The Reincarnated Shark Prince is an Uncontrollable Carnivore ~Ultimate, Amazing Sex That Crosses Human Boundaries!?~

altTitles.ja: 転生サメ王子は制御不能の肉食獣〜究極絶倫SEXは人外の快感！？〜（単話）

description.en: “Let me eat you.” One day, a man claiming to be a shark I saved in the past showed up at my place. Typically, I’d drive him away on the spot, but I've always had the uncanny ability to understand the feelings and the words of animals. That’s how I knew that he wasn’t lying. He said he came to pay me back for saving him, but something changed just when we were about to go to sleep. It seemed like his instincts had awakened and made him desire me. It was so sudden and it shocked me, but I found out that his shark instincts had awakened because I'd thrown away his medicine. That medicine supresses his deep sexual desires... Feeling responsible, I entrusted myself to him. When we started having sex, I was surprised. Even though he came immediately after he put it in, he could keep going again and again... Apparently it’s a shark trait, but he kept thrusting over and over... He did say that I don’t have to worry about getting pregnant because he’s a shark though... I’ve never experienced something like this before, and if he keeps this up... I’m gonna go crazy!!
